description: Expose Twilio's APIs to AI assistants and tools supporting the Model Context Protocol. Enable seamless integration of Twilio's communication capabilities into AI workflows. Simplify access to Twilio services through a standardized protocol interface.

services.description: Select which Twilio services to enable (leave empty for all services)

TWILIO_API_KEY.description: Your Twilio API Key starting with 'SK'. Create one in Twilio Console > Account > API Keys & Tokens.

TWILIO_API_SECRET.description: Your Twilio API Secret (paired with the API Key above)

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID starting with 'AC'. Find this in your Twilio Console Dashboard.
